title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 53-1.2 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 53-1.2 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Part shall apply to all insurers, fraternal benefit societies, and life insurance departments of savings banks licensed to do business in this State. This Part shall be applicable to any act of solicitation, negotiation or procurement of a life insurance policy or an annuity contract within the State including any act done by mail, telephone, electronic or any other method to present the information required by section
3209
of the Insurance Law, and shall be applicable to any illustration presented in this State for the purpose of proposing to make a sale of a life insurance policy or an annuity contract. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
§§
53-1.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
